duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with project teams to assist with project deliverables.
Develop client facing content related to business solutions using operational best practices.
Create and enhance internal tools to support consulting methodologies and client deliverables.
Leverage new technologies to drive efficiencies in current processes.
Develop solutions for industry related toolsets related to RSM intellectual property (“IP”).
Participate in project scoping and solution development meetings.
Test proposed solutions within lab environments.
Map client business requirements to Microsoft Dynamics 365 F&S.
Design and document solutions, functions, and features to meet business objectives.
Work and interact with clients and project teams to configure D365 F&S solutions.

education_certification.credential: Working towards a degree in Business Administration/Management, Computer Science, Information Systems, Management Information Systems (MIS), or similar
